info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of security transfer orders, view the inbound and outbound security transfer orders and creation of orders through channels
info.title: API for security transfer orders

get.description: Retrieves the inbound free of payment security transfers

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.description: Retrieves the outbound free of payment security transfers

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

get.summary: Allows to view the Security Transfer Order details
get.description: Allows to view the Security Transfer Order details along with the delivery message information

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the instrument

parameters.name: depositoryId
parameters.description: Id of the securities depository.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

post.summary: Creates a security transfer order draft
post.description: Creates a security transfer order draft

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

inputter.description: The user identifier who input the transaction

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

inputter.description: The user identifier who input the transaction

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

customerChargeTaxType.description: The type of charge or tax to be paid by the customer

customerChargeTaxAmount.description: The amount of charges or taxes to be paid by customer

taxAmount.description: Total amount of taxes applicable on all commission or charges calculated for the transaction/payment.
Total amount of taxes applicable on all commission or charges calculated for the transaction/payment.

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

transferDate.description: The transfer date of the transaction

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

deliveryInstruction.description: Type of Delivery to be made for this transaction. Allowed values: - DAP: Delivery Against Payment - FOP: Free of Payment

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

valueInInstrumentCurrency.description: The amount converted to the currency of the instrument

charges.description: The charges or fees for this transaction

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

interestAmount.description: The accrued Interest due or accrued.

netAmountInInstrumentCurrency.description: The net amount of the current valuation of the Securities being transferred, i.e.. the gross amount +/- Charges + accrued Interest

netAmountInAccountCurrency.description: The net amount due to or from the Customer after +/- Charges

exchangeRate.description: Contains the exchange rate returned from the system. i.e. For entries over foreign currency accounts, this contains the rate which used to convert the currency amount to the local equivalent at the time of the originating transaction.

commission.description: The bank fees or commission charged for the transaction

customerCommissionTax.description: Specifies the tax amount based on the commission charged

commissionName.description: The name that is displayed for the commission

commissionRate.description: The commission by percentage. Allowed only for manual commission. Calculated commission amount can be overwritten manually.

changeInBeneficialOwner.description: Indicates whether there is a beneficial owner change as a result of the transfer

stampTax.description: The Stamp Tax amount charged to the Customer for the trade

counterpartyId.description: The identifier of the counter party

BIC.description: The BIC code of the Beneficiary bank

counterpartyDepository.description: Specifies the Depository(ies) that the Broker will be delivering the Securities from or to.

brokerAmount.description: Net amount due to/from the broker for the transaction. Applicable only where the security transfer is made against payment.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

messageType.description: Defines the type of swift messages that are sent or received for a transaction

dateTime.description: Contains the date and time separated by '-'

matchCode.description: Defines the status of settlement instruction for the incoming MT548 swift message. Sample values are 1. MTCH/MACH 2. IPRC/PACK

matchCodeDescription.description: Contains the description of the status of settlement Instruction.  Sample values are 1. Matched 2. Acknowledged/Accepted

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

interestAmount.description: The accrued Interest due or accrued.

commission.description: The bank fees or commission charged for the transaction

taxAmount.description: Total amount of taxes applicable on all commission or charges calculated for the transaction/payment.

charges.description: The charges or fees for this transaction

grossInterestAccrued.description: Contains the sum of gross amount and interest accrued

depositoryConfirmationKey.description: Contains the incoming MT544-547 Swift message reference

depositoryConfirmationTime.description: Contains the date and time of receipt of depository confirmation swift MT544-547

settlementStatusKey.description: Contains the swift message MT548 reference of the status of settlement Instruction sent

settlementStatusTime.description: Contains the date and time of receipt of swift message MT548 (Status of Settlement Instruction)
